gameDetails.name: Rattle, Battle, Grab the Loot: Angry Ocean
gameDetails.description:
Rattle, Battle, Grab the Loot: Angry Ocean adds two new scenario packs to the Rattle, Battle, Grab the Loot base game as well as two custom dice with a character card for each.

In the first scenario, "Angry Ocean", the ocean fights back with krakens, rocks, wrecks, and whirlpools. In the second scenario, "Old Dogs", players are veteran pirates near retirement who are out for one last adventure. Your galleons begin the game fully equipped and cannot be modified after adventures. The Old Dogs just want treasure!
